subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: MIAMI, June 25 (AP) — Three outs left and in comes Kevin Gregg, who steps on the mound and gives the batter a menacing stare behind his reflective shades.
snippet: MIAMI, June 25 (AP) — Three outs left and in comes Kevin Gregg, who steps on the mound and gives the batter a menacing stare behind his reflective shades.
